Debrief.Wrappers.Track

Class CoreTMASegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.Plottables
      • Debrief.Wrappers.Track.TrackWrapper_Support.BaseItemLayer
        • Debrief.Wrappers.Track.TrackSegment
          • Debrief.Wrappers.Track.CoreTMASegment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanBePlottedWithTimeVariable, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Plottable>, java.util.EventListener, CanEnumerate, Editable, GriddableSeriesMarker, HasEditables, Layer, Layers.NeedsWrappingInLayerManager, Plottable, PlottablesType, Renamable, DraggableItem, SupportsPropertyListeners
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbsoluteTMASegment, RelativeTMASegment

    public abstract class CoreTMASegment
extends TrackSegment
implements CanBePlottedWithTimeVariable
    the core elements of a TMA Segment - relative plotting, plus the fact that the segment is actually defined by a course and speed, not a collection of data points
    Author:
    ianmayo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
